title: It's So Easy - Crochet Fashions & Accessories (gnv64)
description:
It's So Easy: Crochet Fashions & Accessories: 19 Simple Easy-to-Stitch Fashions and Accessories for Today's Crocheter 
By Annie's
Annie's | August 2013 | ISBN-10: 1596358351 | PDF | 68 pages | 15.2 mb <a href="
http://www.amazon.com/Its-So-Easy-Fashions-Accessories/dp/1596358351" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.amazon.com/Its-So-Easy-Fashions-Accessories/dp/1596358351</a>

Crocheting becomes a breeze with this craft guide to creating a variety of impressive wearable projects. Great for all skill levels, the book teaches how to read a crochet pattern and provides step-by-step basic stitch drawings and diagrams. The 19 easy-to-make items include scarves, hats, cardigans, cowls, fingerless gloves, a purse, and more. Designs use yarns from fine weight to bulky weight and fit sizes SÃ¢â‚¬â€œ3XL, where applicable.
AnnieÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s is part of the third-generation Muselman family business, founded in 1925 and long known for original craft designs including crochet, knitting, card making, paper crafts, beading, sewing, quilting, and needlework. AnnieÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s books are sold through independent retailers and major chain stores worldwide. They are headquartered in Berne, Indiana.
